text:
@PaulKagame @WHO @StateHouseKenya @Macky_Sall @MagufuliJP @Presidence_RDC @CyrilRamaphosa @BorisJohnson @KGeorgieva We thank you our beloved President for the measure that government has been taken to fight againt Coronavirus pendamic.keep it up!!
God bless you!!
